thread.section_title: Event Decor Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Event Decor Direct | eventdecordirect.com
thread.title: Patricia Klinakis
thread.title_full: Event Decor Direct reviewed by Patricia Klinakis

author: Patricia Klinakis
title: Patricia Klinakis
text: Event Décor never disappoints! The service is consistent with every single order. The product line is stunning, of exceptional quality and so affordable. Both the sales staff and customer service reps are knowledgeable and quick to resolve any and all issues. Would highly recommend Event Décor for your future events!
